
The admin left their low-exponent RSA signature on an encrypted flag. Recover the signed flag from this: 0x66da431e602a101dc00aee469dbae1acce88918079b08e776bc2a3be22baf55261c32b72719ac986d740d13761c11858521369aa63737bc946627a5c9969ca54

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{z1bvb30a}
ciphertext: 0x66da431e602a101dc00aee469dbae1acce88918079b08e776bc2a3be22baf55261c32b72719ac986d740d13761c11858521369aa63737bc946627a5c9969ca54
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (7848491954121405222203720528247064424142947585974191604562569760324749905168910648969186726883056473948309896320453825670344199199295296829882257120700279, 3)

archetype: signature_schemes
